text:
You need Marketing Hub  Professional, Enterprise, (Legacy) Marketing Hub Basic
Or the HubSpot CMS

Hey everyone, where can I find documentation for the new site search and site search results modules (not the google search)? I'm trying to implement and running into a lot of questions/issues. I couldn't find any docs so I added the modules to a drag and drop template and then cloned to html, but I can't seem to change any settings on those modules in alignment with the options the API docs say we have around limiting the search to a specific domain or content type, etc...any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks!
<@UHE8JR508>  There is a channel called <#C9LPMCT35|site-search-feedback> I believe there a pinned item on there with a link to it. Should be the dev docs somewhere.
Sorry crazy busy weekend. The most helpful thing for me was the google doc with the api info thats pinned in the <#C9LPMCT35|site-search-feedback> channel
Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2> I found those docs earlier, but I can't seem to get them to work in the module context as attributes...
It's ok, I appreciate you reaching out.
And i custom built a search module from the Javascript api. It's fairly easy to work with

I might need some help figuring out how to make the module work... ```{% module_block module "search"  label='Site Search Input' wrapping_html='', per_widget_wrapper_html='', overrideable=True, widget_name='Site Search Input', module_id=2712622, path='@HubSpot/search_input' %}
{% end_module_block %}```
That's what I get by default when I convert the drag and drop module to html
If you need more advanced control over search i recommend sitesearch360
but I can't figure out how to adjust the settings with the attributes listed in the API docs
OK, so are you saying there's no native way to do this with the module itself? I have to make a custom search using the API?
